TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_lantern
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_sign", "quantity": 12, "index": 11}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_slab", "quantity": 55, "index": 14}, {"type": "spruce_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "acacia_sign", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "strider_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 31}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "orange_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 49, "index": 44}]

thought: I need to craft a soul lantern, which requires iron nuggets and a soul torch. To craft the iron nuggets, I need to place an iron ingot in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the iron ingot from slot 43 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1
